name: Giftologia
overview:
It is so often we have no clue of what to present to your girlfriend, mother, friend etc… Some of us start to seek for a present at the very last moment and still do not have any kind of gift ideas, althrough good ideas are often beside us. Our main target is to assist you in those moments, when you don not even have a thought, but the gift is needed shortly..

So, now, by chooszing the cathegory of relationship (ex. brother, boss), and clicking “OK”, you will get hunderds of fresh ideas, and it is some kind of a gift brainstorming!

After that, you can select the most appropriate ideas by clicking on “+” at the top-right angle of each idea or start to search it in web by clicking on the idea link.

Please, do not be a 100% consumer, share your gift ideas with others by clicking “Add your idea”.

We hope that our project will make your gift more desired!
